description: Both Yoriko and Rumiko block Kyouta`s attempts to contact them. The lead role in Yoriko`s first movie was casted with Kanzaki Akane who turns out to be no match for Saraswati. Kanae`s star is sinking. Lemon attacks T.L.System in their band bus, using ice magic to cause a traffic accident; Shingo suffers severe injuries. Jun and Kyouta are stunned when they watch the press conference of Yoriko`s movie on TV. Rumiko tries to stop Yoriko, only to learn how much her cousin has changed.
